fields.body: This price is based on a currency conversion.
fields.help_text: Displayed when there is a currency conversion.
Once all packages have a price this section displays on the checkout.

fields.body: To proceed with this order, click the button below. Otherwise you can add more offers or alter your banding information to see an updated offer.
fields.help_text: Once all packages have a price this section displays on the checkout.

fields.body:
Thanks!

Many thanks for your interest in the OBC. We will be in touch shortly.
fields.help_text: Appears on the final order page.

fields.body: Please ensure you download your order documents using the button below. It contains your selected offers, quoted price and order number.
